title: Cod with soy greens & coconut rice

ingredients.item: 250g pack Tilda Coconut Steamed Basmati Rice

instructions.step: Halve the cod loin and place into a small frying pan with the milk. Cover with a lid or foil and cook gently for 8-10 minutes until thoroughly cooked. Combine the soy sauce and honey in a small bowl to make a dressing.
Cook the asparagus in boiling water for 3 minutes until just tender. Place the pak choi on top, cover with a lid and cook for a furtherÂ 2 minutes. Drain well.
Cook the rice according to pack instructions. Divide between serving plates and spoon the vegetables and drained fish on top. Serve drizzled with the soy dressing.
